comment: Inference that has ~ ax-12 (without ` A. y ` ) as its conclusion. Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. The hypotheses may be eliminable without using ~ ax-12 in special cases. Proof similar to Lemma 16 of [Tarski] p. 70. (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2008.)
